short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TempMail Extension by Punit Pareek offers temporary email addresses for privacy, preventing spam and keeping your inbox clean.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TempMail Extension provides a convenient and secure way to manage temporary email addresses directly from your browser. With this extension, you can generate disposable email addresses to receive and read emails without exposing your personal email address. This is especially useful for online registrations, newsletters, or any situation where you want to avoid spam.
